On lease acceptance, opens a snapshot-based revenue round.","errors":{"AccessControlBadConfirmation()":[{"details":"The caller of a function is not the expected one. NOTE: Don't confuse with {AccessControlUnauthorizedAccount}."}],"AccessControlUnauthorizedAccount(address,bytes32)":[{"details":"The `account` is missing a role."}]},"events":{"RoleAdminChanged(bytes32,bytes32,bytes32)":{"details":"Emitted when `newAdminRole` is set as ``role``'s admin role, replacing `previousAdminRole` `DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE` is the starting admin for all roles, despite {RoleAdminChanged} not being emitted to signal this."},"RoleGranted(bytes32,address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` is granted `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call. This account bears the admin role (for the granted role). Expected in cases where the role was granted using the internal {AccessControl-_grantRole}."},"RoleRevoked(bytes32,address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` is revoked `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call:   - if using `revokeRole`, it is the admin role bearer   - if using `renounceRole`, it is the role bearer (i.e. `account`)"}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"acceptLeaseBid(uint256,uint256,bytes,string)":{"details":"Non-winning bids on the same offer are refunded immediately."},"constructor":{"params":{"admin":"Address receiving admin role.","leaseFactory_":"LeaseFactory address.","stablecoin":"Stablecoin address (mock in tests)."}},"getRoleAdmin(bytes32)":{"details":"Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}."},"grantRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event."},"hasRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Returns `true` if `account` has been granted `role`."},"renounceRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event."},"revokeRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event."},"supportsInterface(bytes4)":{"details":"Returns true if this contract implements the interface defined by `interfaceId`. See the corresponding https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-165#how-interfaces-are-identified[ERC section] to learn more about how these ids are created. This function call must use less than 30 000 gas."}},"title":"Marketplace","version":1},"userdoc":{"events":{"LeaseAccepted(uint256,uint256,address,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when a lease bid is accepted and a Lease NFT is minted."},"LeaseBidPlaced(uint256,uint256,address,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when a lease bid is placed."},"LeaseOfferPosted(uint256,address,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when a lease offer is posted."},"RevenueClaimed(uint256,address,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when an account claims its share."},"RevenueRoundOpened(uint256,address,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when a revenue round is opened."},"SaleBidAccepted(uint256,uint256,address)":{"notice":"Emitted when a sale bid is accepted."},"SaleBidPlaced(uint256,uint256,address,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when a funded sale bid is placed."},"SaleBidRefunded(uint256,uint256,address,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when a sale bid is refunded."},"SalePosted(uint256,address,address,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when a sale is posted."}},"kind":"user","methods":{"ADMIN_ROLE()":{"notice":"Role for admin operations."},"acceptLeaseBid(uint256,uint256,bytes,string)":{"notice":"Accepts a lease bid, mints the Lease NFT via LeaseFactory, and opens a revenue round."},"acceptSaleBid(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Accepts a specific bid; transfers tokens and pays seller; refunds other active bids."},"claimRevenue(uint256)":{"notice":"Claims the caller's share of a revenue round: amount * balanceOfAt / totalSupplyAt."},"getRevenueRound(uint256)":{"notice":"Returns info for a revenue round."},"leaseFactory()":{"notice":"Lease factory used to mint Lease NFTs after acceptance."},"placeLeaseBid(uint256,bytes,uint256)":{"notice":"Places a funded lease bid with the lessee's signature."},"placeSaleBid(uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Places a fully-funded bid on a sale (escrows stablecoin in this contract)."},"postLeaseOffer((address,address,uint256,address,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint64,uint64,bytes32,bytes32,uint256,uint64,uint16,bytes32))":{"notice":"Posts a lease offer. In v1, payment token must be the configured stablecoin."},"postSale(address,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Posts a sale for a given amount of an asset ERC-20."},"stable()":{"notice":"Stablecoin used for bids, escrow, and payouts."}},"notice":"Simple marketplace for selling whole/fractional asset ERC-20 tokens and for funded lease acceptLeaseBid(uint256,uint256,bytes,str.details: Non-winning bids on the same offer are refunded immediately.

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event.

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: Returns true if this contract implements the interface defined by `interfaceId`. See the corresponding https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-165#how-interfaces-are-identified[ERC section] to learn more about how these ids are created. This function call must use less than 30 000 gas.

acceptLeaseBid(uint256,uint256,bytes,str.notice: Accepts a lease bid, mints the Lease NFT via LeaseFactory, and opens a revenue round.

acceptSaleBid(uint256,uint256).notice: Accepts a specific bid; transfers tokens and pays seller; refunds other active bids.

claimRevenue(uint256).notice: Claims the caller's share of a revenue round: amount * balanceOfAt / totalSupplyAt.

getRevenueRound(uint256).notice: Returns info for a revenue round.

leaseFactory().notice: Lease factory used to mint Lease NFTs after acceptance.

placeLeaseBid(uint256,bytes,uint256).notice: Places a funded lease bid with the lessee's signature.

placeSaleBid(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Places a fully-funded bid on a sale (escrows stablecoin in this contract).

postLeaseOffer((address,address,uint256,.notice: Posts a lease offer. In v1, payment token must be the configured stablecoin.

postSale(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Posts a sale for a given amount of an asset ERC-20.

stable().notice: Stablecoin used for bids, escrow, and payouts.
